nodes.text: Malidris was the city that served as capital of Iridonia.
Malidris was host to the Zabrak council that governed the world and esteemed guests were lodged in apartments near the Capital Square.

The city was visited at one point by Luke Skywalker as an ambassador for the New Republic. He ventured to the planet to help with opening new trade routes to the Outer Rim Territories, but became embroiled in an investigation into a mysterious ghostly apparation said to be the deceased Sith Lord Darth Maul.

Tracking down the apparition which had a strong presence in the Force, Skywalker found the laboratory of Drell Kahmf a mad Zabrak scientist who claimed to have salvaged the brain of Maul and was using it in conjunction with a solid-state hologram to help Maul get revenge and restore his reputation. Appalled at this experiment, Skywalker switched off the machine keeping the brain alive.
